function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Nurse managers and healthcare personnel being exposed to COVID-19 in the hospital environment","Impact":"Increased risk of infection, spread of the virus, and potential severe illness","Mitigation":"Provision of adequate personal protective equipment (PPE), strict infection control measures, and vaccination","Technologies":"Advanced PPE, disinfection technologies, and vaccine distribution systems","People":"Nurse managers, healthcare personnel, patients, and visitors","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare authorities, and government"},{"Description":"Qualitative approach leading to potential bias in the study results","Impact":"Inaccurate or skewed understanding of the challenges and practices facing nursing managers in COVID-19 management","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data collection methods, triangulation of data, and peer review of findings","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, qualitative research software, and peer review platforms","People":"Research team, peer reviewers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Research institution, funding agencies, and academic bodies"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed healthcare system due to pandemic management challenges","Impact":"Decreased quality of patient care, increased stress and burnout among healthcare personnel, and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Resource allocation, support for mental health, and emergency response planning","Technologies":"Healthcare management software, telemedicine platforms, and data analytics for resource allocation","People":"Healthcare personnel, patients, and community","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government, and public health organizations"}]}
